data.name: Ein's Sword
data.detailed_description:
~About~.
A familiar game system with field battles at its core.
A game design that allows players to gain an advantage as they advance through the stages.
Dungeons and unique characters set in the Lost Tower.
The first 3D action game from Infinite Games.
~Character~.
Ein / Ein
Sword collector who travels the world
Searching for the legendary sword.
~Story~
It is a time when sword saints reign supreme. In a world where the sword is the only way to show one's power, everyone is eager to obtain it.
Then, Ein hears a rumor of a legendary sword.
The Lost Tower, which is said to reach to the sky. In the top of the tower, there is a sword that can make any wish come true.
Ein immediately headed for the Lost Tower. There was more to the rumor. No one who has entered the Lost Tower has ever returned home.
Will Ein be able to obtain the legendary sword?
~System~.
Simple field battles and training
Defeat enemies that appear in the field and obtain ability points every time you level up.
Raise your favorite stats to gain an advantage in battle!
Easy to use and comfortable to play!

data.short_description: Simple field battles and training. Defeat enemies that appear in the field and obtain ability points every time you level up. Raise your preferred status and advance the battle to an advantage. Easy to use and comfortable to play.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10/Windows11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 9th Gen
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660 SUPER
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10/Windows11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 9th Gen
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660 SUPER
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
